ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clscld.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 | 1 | #P_cldss2 | |- ( Clsd ` J ) C_ ~P X |
| 3 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( J e. Top -> ( Clsd ` J ) C_ ~P X ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_topcld | |- ( J e. Top -> X e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_intcld | |- ( ( x =/= (/) /\ x C_ ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> |^| x e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( x C_ ( Clsd ` J ) /\ x =/= (/) ) -> |^| x e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ x C_ ( Clsd ` J ) /\ x =/= (/) ) -> |^| x e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 4, 7 | #P_ismred | |- ( J e. Top -> ( Clsd ` J ) e. ( Moore ` X ) ) |
